translation.definition: and, as for, but, same conjunction,
to say, to tell, to speak
not a, not, neither… nor conjunction,
now, right, well, come on interj,
attached to, in the presence of, by, about
to go out, come out, appear
only, as soon as adverb, conj
to take a look, watch, inspect
in general, altogether, on the whole
to be in time, be successful
to pass, go by, be over
to get up, rise, stand up
in now way, by no means
to lay down, put down, place
to take away, take off; photograph
to the point, at the same time
as… as possible(as in as soon as possible)
to accompany, set off; conduct; spend
to come up, approach; to fit
there is nothing, there is no need
to get used to, to grow accustomed to
to use, utilize, make use of
it's time; at times, now and then
